data.title: Popular Hotels in Mollösund with Deals - Airpaz
data.meta_description: Book popular Mollösund hotels at Airpaz. Get exclusive promo discount for your online booking.
data.text:
Prästgårdens Pensionat

Mollösund

|

Şehir merkezine 0.749 km

This hotel is set in the small fishing village of Mollösund in the Bohuslän archipelago. It offers a communal kitchen, fireplace lounge and glass veranda. Free Wi-Fi access is available. A private bathroom is featured in some individually decorated room at Prästgårdens Pensionat. All have views over the garden. During nice weather, guests can enjoy their breakfast in Prästgården’s garden. Other meals can be prepared in the guest kitchen. Gothenburg is about a 1-hour drive away, while the town of Ellös and Orust Golf Club are both 20 minutes’ drive from the property.

Mollösunds Wärdshus

Mollösund

|

Şehir merkezine 0.192 km

Located in Mollösund, 48 km from Nordiska Akvarellmuseet, Mollösunds Wärdshus provides accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and free WiFi. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At the hotel all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at Mollösunds Wärdshus can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The nearest airport is Trollhattan Airport, 89 km from the accommodation.

charming house in Mollösund

Mollösund

|

Şehir merkezine 0.23 km

Located in Mollösund, 48 km from Nordiska Akvarellmuseet, charming house in Mollösund provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. With inner courtyard views, this accommodation features a patio. Guests have access to a public bath and open-air bath. The holiday home with a terrace and garden views features 3 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Guests can take in the ambience of the surroundings from an outdoor dining area or keep themselves warm by the fireplace on colder days. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance. The holiday home has a barbecue and a garden, which can be enjoyed by guests if the weather permits. The nearest airport is Trollhattan Airport, 90 km from charming house in Mollösund.

Trevligt hus & Sjöbod i mysiga Mollösund Tången

Mollösund

|

Şehir merkezine 1.142 km

Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a patio, Trevligt hus & Sjöbod i mysiga Mollösund Tången is situated in Mollösund. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. On clear days, guests can head outside to enjoy the holiday home's outdoor fireplace or simply kick back and relax. The spacious holiday home with a terrace and mountain views has 4 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the holiday home. The accommodation offers a fireplace. Guests at the holiday home will be able to enjoy activities in and around Mollösund, like walking tours. Outdoor play equipment is also available at Trevligt hus & Sjöbod i mysiga Mollösund Tången, while guests can also relax in the garden. Nordiska Akvarellmuseet is 47 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Trollhattan Airport, 88 km from Trevligt hus & Sjöbod i mysiga Mollösund Tången.

Holiday home MOLLÖSUND

Mollösund

|

Şehir merkezine 0.792 km

Holiday home MOLLÖSUND is situated in Mollösund and offers barbecue facilities and a terrace. The holiday home is equipped with a TV. The kitchen features a dishwasher, a microwave and a fridge, as well as coffee machine. The nearest airport is Trollhattan Airport, 57 km from the holiday home.

Kvarnstugan

Mollösund

|

Şehir merkezine 0.372 km

Boasting garden views, Kvarnstugan features accommodation with a garden and a patio, around 48 km from Nordiska Akvarellmuseet. There is an in-house restaurant, plus free private parking and free WiFi are available. The spacious holiday home has 4 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and 2 living rooms. Guests can take in the views of the sea from the terrace, which also has outdoor furniture. There is also a seating area and a fireplace. For those times when you'd rather not dine out, you can choose to cook on the barbecue. Guests at the holiday home will be able to enjoy activities in and around Mollösund, like fishing. The nearest airport is Trollhattan Airport, 89 km from Kvarnstugan.

Holiday home MOLLÖSUND III

Mollösund

|

Şehir merkezine 0.362 km

Holiday home MOLLÖSUND III is located in Mollösund and offers barbecue facilities and a terrace. With free WiFi, this holiday home provides a TV, a washing machine and a kitchen with a dishwasher and microwave. The nearest airport is Trollhattan Airport, 58 km from the holiday home.

Sommarhus Tången, Mollösund

Mollösund

|

Şehir merkezine 1.712 km

Located in Mollösund in the Orust region, Sommarhus Tången, Mollösund offers accommodation with access to a public bath. This property offers access to a patio and free private parking. The property is non-smoking and is set 46 km from Nordiska Akvarellmuseet. The holiday home features a terrace, 2 bedrooms, a living room and a well-equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave. Towels and bed linen are featured in the holiday home. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance. Guests can take advantage of the warm weather with the property's barbecue facilities. Guests at the holiday home will be able to enjoy activities in and around Mollösund, like walking tours. Guests at Sommarhus Tången, Mollösund can enjoy fishing and hiking nearby, or make the most of the garden. The nearest airport is Trollhattan Airport, 87 km from the accommodation.
